info.name: Trigeminal nerve, motor root
info.description: The trigeminal cranial nerve has both a sensory and motor root.  The motor root travels with the mandibular division of the sensory root.  The motor portion of the trigeminal innervates muscles derived from the first pharyngeal arch.  This includes the muscles of mastication, mylohyoid, anterior belly of the digastric, tensor tympani and tensor veli palatini.
